content.prompt: Which of the following graphs best depicts the results of Ms. Foxâ€™s study?

choices.label:
• The scatterplot has 7 data points.
  • The values are approximate.
  • The data points are as follows:
    • Conscientiousness Score 4, Final grade 95%
    • Conscientiousness Score 4, Final grade 82%
    • Conscientiousness Score 4, Final grade 81%
    • Conscientiousness Score 5, Final grade 71%
    • Conscientiousness Score 6, Final grade 70%
    • Conscientiousness Score 9, Final grade 61%
    • Conscientiousness Score 10, Final grade 58%
  • The line of best fit extends from the top left corner to the right midpoint of the scatterplot.

assistive_label.label: Figure for Option A. Refer to its long description
